description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Fight off the zombie madness. Blast the zombies before they eat your brains! You are stuck alone in the middle of a city with a lot of zombies. Crowds of hungry zombies are eager to eat you alive. Shoot them as fast as you can, develop better skills and get the hell out of there!
description.short: Fight off the zombie madness. Blast the zombies before they eat your brains! You are stuck alone in the middle of a city with a lot of zombies.
